A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
"Forty-something year olds\, we all have to understand this is Star Wars for a new generation."

Well\, then call it STAR WARS NEW GENERATION and stop destroying and humiliating the characters of the original trilogy.

Is that asking too much?

I'm not interested in the NEW GENERATION\, though\, so I will not buy tickets for watching those movies. No "hardcore fan" will buy tickets for them\, and this is why Disney did not tell us that it was a Star Wars for a new generation. They wanted our money\, so they tricked us into believing that The Last Jedi was a REAL Star Wars Movie. Watch the trailers and then tell me that they did not hint at that.

There is only one thing I want to tell Disney:

Fuck me once. I blame you.
Fuck me twice\, I blame myself.
